messages.message:
Devops Engineer - Direct Hire - Scottsdale

Dear Brian, 

I came across your profile and wanted to reach out to you in regards to a direct hire opportunity I am currently working on in the Scottsdale area for a Devops engineer. It is looking for someone with a background in Linux, Java, and ideally some cloud experience within AWS or Azure. 

Thank you and hope to talk soon!

Brandon Hirneise
bhirneise@apexsystemsinc.com
It's with Choice Hotels. Has someone else reached out to you in regards to the position yet? If not I would love to go over it with you further.
Yes. Choice hotels is full of it. I've applied and never heard back.
They only conduct interviews so they have an excuse to hire Indians.
